name: @vlah.io/ngx-success-box

scripts.fix-version-patch: cd projects/ngx-success-box && npm version patch && cd ../../ && npm run git-add-version
scripts.fix-version-minor: cd projects/ngx-success-box && npm version minor && cd ../../ && npm run git-add-version
scripts.fix-version-major: cd projects/ngx-success-box && npm version major && cd ../../ && npm run git-add-version
scripts.prep-release: npm run fix-public-api && npm run fix-readme
scripts.prep-package: npm run lint && npm run prep-release && npm run build
scripts.preversion: npm run lint && npm run prep-release
scripts.postversion: npm run build && npm run fix-assets && npm run publish-release && npm run git-push
scripts.make-patch-release: npm run fix-version-patch && npm run git-commit && npm version patch
scripts.make-minor-release: npm run fix-version-minor && npm run git-commit && npm version minor
scripts.make-major-release: npm run fix-version-major && npm run git-commit && npm version major

description: Set of reusable Angular components (factory workers) to help display success messages.
author: @vlah.io
